title: Name Changing or Not?
body: {{champion:103}} I'm LUCKY to have this name, but still though, now the "Challenger Ahri" comes out, I'm just wondering is dat name better than  "Popstar Ahri"?

replies.body: inb4 someone sees this and makes a level 1 smurf called 'Challenger Ahri'.
Best name would be "Ahri waifu forever", exactly 16 characters too so it's within the name size limit.

The corrupted way to pronounce "wife", or how it would sound like if a Japanese who hasn't learned English were to speak the word for the first time (due to their native language's pronunciation so you can't really blame them). 

To cut to the conclusion, a "waifu" is a 2D girl (game character, anime character, or any fictional character) you admire and to the point you would wish to engage a relationship with.

It's for the most part used in a joke manner in jest referring to that particular character(s) a person's obsessed with, or just simply adore/admire and wish that 2D pixel is in fact a living being.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=bTrEzQyx,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-17T12:21:22.622+0000)
>
> The corrupted way to pronounce "wife", or how it would sound like if a Japanese who hasn't learned English were to speak the word for the first time (due to their native language's pronunciation so you can't really blame them). 
> 
> To cut to the conclusion, a "waifu" is a 2D girl (game character, anime character, or any fictional character) you admire and to the point you would wish to engage a relationship with.
> 
> It's for the most part used in a joke manner in jest referring to that particular character(s) a person's obsessed with, or just simply adore/admire and wish that 2D pixel is in fact a living being.

You're my waifu :3
